text: Are there any Web Sever modules in python?
I am looking for a web server module for python to work as a part of an application.
I tried SimpleHTTPServer but it doesn't process python files.
It serves the source code as text instead which is not what I am trying to accomplish.
I need the server to be a module of python and process python files and serve the return of these files.
Are there any (Simple,Light weight)good [or bad] modules to do that ?
